thread.title: Takeda sweetens the pill for Shire with $64 billion takeover offer

title: Takeda sweetens the pill for Shire with $64 billion takeover offer
text:
Takeda sweetens the pill for Shire with $64 billion takeover offer 8:18am EDT - 01:51
Rare disease specialist Shire says it is willing to recommend a sweetened $64 billion offer from Japan's Takeda Pharmaceutical Co to shareholders, in what would be the biggest acquisition of a drug company this year. Silvia Antonioli reports.
Rare disease specialist Shire says it is willing to recommend a sweetened $64 billion offer from Japan's Takeda Pharmaceutical Co to shareholders, in what would be the biggest acquisition of a drug company this year. Silvia Antonioli reports. //reut.rs/2KfYNkC
